synopsis.text: Tabata Hana, a self-proclaimed 'ugly' girl, finds solace in the early mornings at her high school, where she secretly tends to the classroom flowers and indulges in fantasies of being a manga heroine. Her quiet routine is unexpectedly disrupted when Yousuke, the most handsome boy in her class, stumbles upon her private moment. Despite her fears of being ridiculed, Yousuke's curiosity about the mysterious flower caretaker leads to an unlikely connection between them. However, Hana's negative self-image and Yousuke's innocence in matters of love create a challenging dynamic. As they navigate their budding relationship, can Hana learn to see herself in a new light and allow love to bloom? Join this endearing comedy that will have you rooting for the underdog and believing in the power of love.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
